definitions.definition: An upholstered sofa , without arms or a back , sometimes with a compartment for storing linen etc.
A low stool or thick cushion used to rest the feet or as a seat .
A fabric with a pronounced ribbed or corded effect, often made of silk or a mixture of cotton and silk-like yarns.

main_definition: ( furniture ) An upholstered sofa , without arms or a back , sometimes with a compartment for storing linen etc.
secondary_definitions: ( furniture ) A low stool or thick cushion used to rest the feet or as a seat .
( textiles ) A fabric with a pronounced ribbed or corded effect, often made of silk or a mixture of cotton and silk-like yarns.
